description: This file defines a Data Access Object (DAO) interface 'NoteDao' for managing CRUD operations related to 'Note' entities in a Room database, including methods for querying, inserting, updating, and deleting notes, with support for LiveData to observe data changes.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Data Access Object interface for CRUD operations on Note entities.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated timestamp in descending order, returning LiveData for observation.

methods.name: getByCategory
methods.description: Retrieves notes filtered by category, ordered by last updated timestamp, returning LiveData.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Suspending function to retrieve a single note by its ID.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a note into the database, replacing existing on conflict, returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Suspending function to update an existing note.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Suspending function to delete a specific note.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Suspending function to delete a note by its ID.
